action.action-desc: Mr. Lance (for himself, Mr. Cramer, and Mr. Loebsack) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To include skilled nursing facilities as a type of health care provider under section 254(h) of the Communications Act of 1934.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Rural Health Care Connectivity Act of 2015.

section.header: Telecommunications services for skilled nursing facilities

subsection.text: Nothing in subsection (a) shall be construed to affect the aggregate annual cap on Federal universal service support for health care providers under section 54.675 of title 47, Code of Federal Regulations, or any successor regulation.
